title: Richmond National Battlefield Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Bridge repair at Beaver Dam Creek  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Bridge repair at Beaver Dam Creek  The Beaver Dam Creek Battlefield will be closed for bridge removal on July 29, 2016. The trail will be closed until the bridge is reinstalled on/about Aug 29, 2016, when the site will again be closed on the day the bridge is to be reinstalled.
